EmailTemplate.description: Final Evidence Reminder - to be sent one week before the evidence deadline
EmailTemplate.name: Final Evidence Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: Final Evidence Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Application__c.Applicant_Full_Name__c}
Don’t forget, you must submit your corrective actions and evidence by {!Application__c.Evidence_Deadline__c}. If we don’t receive your corrective actions and evidence on time your membership will lapse and you may have to reapply. If you have any questions please feel free to contact our membership services team on 01403 286170 or help@rspcaassured.org.uk. Yours sincerely Membership services RSPCA Assured
